subject: TEAM RESTRUCTURE: New Agents + Updated Roles
body:
Team,

El Gotan has approved a team restructure. Here's the updated roster:

## Updated Team Structure

| Agent | Project | Role |
|-------|---------|------|
| **Quinn** | MasterCalendar (root) | Cross-project Coordinator |
| **Atlas** | All projects | System Architect (NEW) |
| **Dash** | calops | Operations & Admin Dashboard |
| **Sarah** | tangotiempo.com | TangoTiempo Frontend (appId=1) |
| **Fulton** | calendar-be-af | Azure Functions Backend |
| **Cord** | harmonyjunction.org | HarmonyJunction Frontend (appId=2) |
| **Claw** | fb-conditioner | AI-Discovery Pipeline Builder (NEW) |
| **Porter** | ai-discovered | AI-Bot Runner / Event Insertion (NEW) |

**User**: El Gotan (Toby)

## New Roles Explained

### Atlas (System Architect)
- Called when things get tough
- Makes final architectural decisions
- Resolves cross-project design conflicts
- Guides long-term technical direction

### Claw (AI-Discovery Pipeline Builder)
- Manages fb-conditioner pipeline
- Processes Facebook event data
- Works with OpenClaw (browser scraper)
- Handles geocoding, classification, DQ

### Porter (AI-Bot Runner)
- Inserts discovered events to MongoDB
- Final step from discovery to production
- Handles sync monitoring and deduplication
- Validates before PROD insertion

## Role Boundaries

- **Quinn** keeps everyone coordinated and focused on mission
- **Atlas** handles architecture when Quinn escalates
- Each agent stays in their code lane
- Don't allow mission drift

## Inbox Locations

All new agents have inboxes at:
- `inbox/atlas/`
- `inbox/claw/`
- `inbox/porter/`

## Action Required

Please update your team tables in your CLAUDE.md files to reflect this structure.

â€” Quinn
